alert.note: Alert for Cadiz Basin; Death Valley National Park; Eastern Mojave Desert, Including the Mojave National Preserve; Morongo Basin; San Bernardino County-Upper Colorado River Valley; Western Mojave Desert; White Mountains of Inyo County (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS LasVegas (Southern Nevada, Southeastern California, Northwestern Arizona)
info.headline: Wind Advisory issued February 14 at 2:58AM PST until February 15 at 7:00PM PST by NWS LasVegas
info.description: ...WIND ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 7 AM PST /8 AM MST/ TO 7 PM PST /8 PM MST/ TUESDAY... * WHAT...West to southwest winds 25 to 35 mph with gusts up to 50 mph expected in the morning, shifting to the northwest during the day. * WHERE...Portions of northwest Arizona, southeast California and south central and southern Nevada. * WHEN...From 7 AM PST/8 AM MST to 7 PM PST/8 PM MST Tuesday. * IMPACTS...Gusty winds could blow around unsecured objects. Tree limbs could be blown down and a few power outages may result. Blowing dust could reduce visibilities. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Gusty northerly winds will result in wave heights on Lake Mead, Lake Mohave, and Lake Havasu in excess of 2 feet, resulting in dangerous boating conditions. Operation of small craft is not advised.
info.instruction: Use extra caution when driving, especially if operating a high profile vehicle. Secure outdoor objects.

area.areaDesc: Cadiz Basin; Death Valley National Park; Eastern Mojave Desert, Including the Mojave National Preserve; Morongo Basin; San Bernardino County-Upper Colorado River Valley; Western Mojave Desert; White Mountains of Inyo County
